alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:27PM CDT until June 06 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Southeastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Olive Branch, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Memphis, Southeast Memphis, Lewisburg, Whitehaven, Alden, Fairhaven, Cedarview, Parkway Village, Bright, Nesbit, Handy Corner, Capleville, Miller and Jago. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
